content: **from the website ** easy crochet kimono pattern featuring moda dea washable wool yarn is the perfect addition to your fall wardrobe **skill level ** easy **sizes ** directions are for small changes for medium large and extra large are in parentheses **to fit bust ** 30-32 34-36 38-40 42-44 **finished bust ** 35 39 43 47 **supplies ** moda dea® washable wool™ art r153 166 yard/3 52 ounce ball 20 24 28 32 ounces or 6 7 8 10 balls 4418 real teal 2 split-lock stitch markers yarn needle 2 yards 3/8 ribbon
